headline: Heavy Rains Disrupt Supply Routes in Mumbai
body: Continuous rainfall has caused roadblocks leading to shipment delays across distribution centers in Mumbai.

headline: Truck Drivers Strike Impacts Deliveries in Delhi NCR
body: A section of truck drivers halted services demanding fuel subsidies, delaying last-mile delivery for retail outlets.

headline: Port Congestion at Navi Mumbai Slows Exports
body: Container movement at the Port of Navi Mumbai has been slowed due to backlog and labor shortages.

headline: Warehouse Maintenance Affects Bangalore Dispatches
body: Routine maintenance in Bangalore warehouse restricted outbound shipments for a day.

headline: Traffic Jam near Factory Zone 01 Causes Delivery Delays
body: Heavy vehicle traffic near industrial Factory_01 resulted in delayed pickup schedules.

headline: BlueDart Introduces Night Deliveries to Counter Rain Delays
body: To handle disruptions caused by rain, BlueDart has started limited night operations in western regions.

headline: Safexpress Reports Temporary Route Diversions
body: Safexpress announced diversion of its fleet from Western India routes due to flooding near Mumbai.

headline: Fuel Price Hike Affects Small Logistics Partners
body: Several smaller logistics partners reported operational slowdowns as diesel prices surged by 5% this week.

headline: DTDC Warehouse Staff Protest Over Working Conditions
body: A small protest at DTDC’s Bangalore facility delayed sorting operations temporarily.

headline: EcomExpress Fleet Maintenance Downtime Scheduled
body: EcomExpress announced planned maintenance for its delivery fleet impacting dispatch schedules on Tuesday.
